title: Mickey & TB Karen | AHS: Double Feature - Episode 2: "Pale" (HQ Clip)
author: AHS Crave
comment:
I have high hopes for Macaulay, 
He’s gonna be great this season
Gosh! I'm starting to include TB Karen as one of my favorite AHS universe characters. I hope they do not murder her or direct the plot that will turn us viewers to hate her.
This scene was so good to watch with both Sarah Paulson and Macaulay Culkin they are amazing
that was my favorite escene, so far
Two incredibly amazing actors together in one scene.
description: "Pale", the second episode of American Horror Story: Double Feature (Part 1 - Red Tide) - written by Brad Falchuk & Ryan Murphy, directed by Loni Peristere - stars Sarah Paulson as Tuberculosis Karen, Evan Peters as Austin Sommers, Lily Rabe as Doris Gardener, Finn Wittrock as Harry Gardener, Ryan Kiera Armstrong as Alma Gardener, Frances Conroy as Belle Noir, Billie Lourd as Lark, Leslie Grossman as Ursula, Adina Porter as Chief Burelson, Angelica Ross as The Chemist, Macaulay Culkin as Mickey, Denis O'Hare as Holden, and Robin Weigert as Martha. All rights belong to FX Networks and Ryan Murphy Television.
